loaderMessage.description: Text to display when the extension is loading

playlistSummary_tooltip.message: Scroll down to count more videos

playlistSummary_totalDuration.description: Text to display as label for the playlist duration

playlistSummary_videosCounted.description: Text to display as label for the videos counted

playlistSummary_videosNotCounted.description: Text to display as label for the videos not counted

problemEncountered_paragraphOne.description: Text to display in first paragraph when a problem has been encountered

problemEncountered_paragraphTwo.description: Text to display in second paragraph when a problem has been encountered
problemEncountered_paragraphTwo.message: Please reload this page to recalculate the playlist duration.

sortDropdown_label.description: Text to display as label for the sort dropdown

sortType_channelName_label_asc.description: Text to display for the ascending 'sort by channel name' option

sortType_channelName_label_desc.description: Text to display for the descending 'sort by channel name' option

sortType_duration_label_asc.description: Text to display for the ascending 'sort by duration' option

sortType_duration_label_desc.description: Text to display for the descending 'sort by duration' option

sortType_index_label_asc.description: Text to display for the ascending 'sort by index' option

sortType_index_label_desc.description: Text to display for the descending 'sort by index' option

sortType_uploadDate_label_asc.description: Text to display for the ascending 'sort by upload date' option

sortType_uploadDate_label_desc.description: Text to display for the descending 'sort by upload date' option

sortType_views_label_asc.description: Text to display for the ascending 'sort by views' option

sortType_views_label_desc.description: Text to display for the descending 'sort by views' option

videoTitle_ageRestricted.description: Title displayed by YouTube for age-restricted videos

videoTitle_deleted.description: Title displayed by YouTube for deleted videos

videoTitle_private.description: Title displayed by YouTube for private videos

videoTitle_restricted.description: Title displayed by YouTube for restricted videos

videoTitle_unavailable_v1.description: First variation of title displayed by YouTube for unavailable videos

videoTitle_unavailable_v2.description: Second variation of title displayed by YouTube for unavailable videos
